name: Paraben Variant 1
description_tr: Hormonal bozukluklara ve kansere yol açabilir.
description_en: May cause hormonal disorders and cancer.
usage: Used in cosmetics as a preservative.
allergic_risk: May cause skin irritation and allergic reactions.

name: BHA (Butylated hydroxyanisole) Variant 2
description_tr: Kanser riski taşıyan bir katkı maddesidir.
description_en: An additive with potential cancer risk.
usage: Used as a preservative in packaged food.
allergic_risk: Can cause allergic reactions in sensitive individuals.

name: E124 (Ponceau 4R) Variant 3
usage: Used as a red food dye.
allergic_risk: Can trigger asthma and cause hyperactivity in children.

name: E102 (Tartrazin) Variant 4
usage: Used as a food coloring agent.
allergic_risk: May trigger allergic reactions, especially in asthmatics.

name: Polyethylene Glycol (PEG) Variant 5
description_tr: Cilt emilimini artırır, zararlı maddelerin geçişini kolaylaştırabilir.
description_en: Increases skin absorption, may allow harmful substances to pass through.
usage: Used in creams and lotions for better texture.
allergic_risk: Possible allergic reactions on sensitive skin.

name: E124 (Ponceau 4R) Variant 6
usage: Used as a red food dye.
allergic_risk: Can trigger asthma and cause hyperactivity in children.

name: Polyethylene Glycol (PEG) Variant 7
description_tr: Cilt emilimini artırır, zararlı maddelerin geçişini kolaylaştırabilir.
description_en: Increases skin absorption, may allow harmful substances to pass through.
usage: Used in creams and lotions for better texture.
allergic_risk: Possible allergic reactions on sensitive skin.

name: Aluminium Variant 8
description_tr: Sinir sistemi üzerinde zararlı etkileri olabilir.
description_en: May negatively affect the nervous system.
usage: Found in deodorants, antiperspirants.
allergic_risk: Can cause skin irritation and swelling.

name: Formaldehyde Variant 9
usage: Used in cleaning products, disinfectants.
allergic_risk: May cause respiratory irritation and skin burns.

usage: Used in cleaning products, disinfectants.
